name: Wealth,ProsperityandAbundanceAffirmations
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A few minutes of daily affirmations from the book 600 Wealth, Prosperity, and Abundance Affirmations by Ryan Hicks. You can get the book with the full 600 Affirmations in electronic book, print book, or audiobook at https://www.TaughtToProfit.com 

I hope these affirmations are a great blessing for you. Please feel free to contact me if you have any comments at https://www.TaughtToProfit.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
